sentence: The walls are thin the lobby does not have an open market the decor is in need of update Etc
The rooms were not updated and dirty
This is a 2 star hotel needs a major renovation staff nice but it was old and dingy
I hung a privacy tag ion my door and was quite surprised to see a note under my door offering to come later or to deliver supplies if I needed a refresh
it is old rooms desperately need a remodel
When we asked why he started looking shifty and said uh I think there was a maintenance issue
Could use some updating but in good condition
Our room seemed a little dated and needs renovations
While the hotel was undergoing renovations it was still nice to be able to have a place to rest after a day at the parks

Only down side is since they are redoing the hotel the parking is limited so if you get back to the hotel at night chances are that you will not find parking aside from the parking overall it was a great stay would book again
The atmosphere especially the bed felt like a motel and reading that the rooms are being renovated makes me hope that ours was not done yet
The hotel is undergoing a major transformation updating and renovating almost everything in sight which is great for such a great location

The hotel is very nice renovated very clean all the staff was excellent Keysha is an excellent girl to sell park tickets very helpful well located close to Disney Universal Downtown Orlando very central to everything
Good value clean renovated room great location
Completely Refurbished and Looks Great
Our room was nice and newly renovated with a large Smart TV
The room was very nice updated
The rooms are recently updated with large tvs mounted to the wall

It takes meto say that this place had excellent customer service and the management was wonderful even the complementary breakfast buffet was excellent they make eggs to order and omelets to order every type of breakfast food you can imagine and the rooms were clean and decently remodeled
Renovated rooms with comfy bed
